mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Walkup, James R.

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Walkup, James R. Patient Age: 28. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Convalescing from fracture of left leg: tibia and fabalae lower third. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/11/14. Nature of Wound: By fall of his horse. Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital Gallipolis 1865/03/13.
